p:
We contrast the behavior of true boundaries for the experimental data set of Fig 5(b) with that of the curvature boundaries, which despite the random variation of the DBS stimulation parameters of the experiment, show little variability ( x
l = 0.388 ± 0.007 V and x
r = 0.807 ± 0.022 V), demonstrating the robustness of our charge quantification algorithms.
